event.description: Gerardo Parra doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Carlos Gonzalez.
Aaron Hill reaches on throwing error by pitcher Jhoulys Chacin. Gerardo Parra to 3rd. Aaron Hill to 2nd.
Justin Upton called out on strikes.
Paul Goldschmidt walks.
Lyle Overbay reaches on force attempt, throwing error by first baseman Chad Tracy. Gerardo Parra scores. Aaron Hill scores. Paul Goldschmidt to 3rd. Lyle Overbay to 2nd.
Ryan Roberts pops out to third baseman Nolan Arenado.
Marc Krauss flies out to center fielder Eric Young.
Henry Blanco grounds out, shortstop Jonathan Herrera to first baseman Chad Tracy.
John McDonald lines out to third baseman Nolan Arenado.
Gerardo Parra homers (1) on a fly ball to right field.
Aaron Hill grounds out, third baseman Nolan Arenado to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Pitcher Change: Christian Friedrich replaces Jhoulys Chacin.
Justin Upton strikes out swinging.
Paul Goldschmidt grounds out, shortstop Jonathan Herrera to first baseman Chad Tracy.
Lyle Overbay doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Carlos Gonzalez.
Ryan Roberts flies out to left fielder Carlos Gonzalez.
Chris Nelson remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Marc Krauss strikes out swinging.
Henry Blanco pops out to second baseman Marco Scutaro.
John McDonald flies out to center fielder Eric Young.
Pitcher Change: Matt Belisle replaces Christian Friedrich.
Defensive Substitution: Andrew Brown replaces left fielder Carlos Gonzalez, batting 3rd, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Wil Nieves replaces catcher Jordan Pacheco, batting 5th, playing catcher.
Defensive Substitution: Ben Paulsen replaces first baseman Chad Tracy, batting 8th, playing first base.
Gerardo Parra strikes out swinging.
Aaron Hill grounds out, shortstop Jonathan Herrera to first baseman Ben Paulsen.
Justin Upton walks.
Paul Goldschmidt singles on a ground ball to right fielder Charlie Blackmon. Justin Upton to 2nd.
Lyle Overbay grounds out, shortstop Jonathan Herrera to first baseman Ben Paulsen.
Pitcher Change: Joe Gardner replaces Matt Belisle.
Defensive Substitution: Kent Matthes replaces center fielder Eric Young, batting 1st, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Tyler Colvin replaces second baseman Marco Scutaro, batting 2nd, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Brendan Harris replaces right fielder Charlie Blackmon, batting 6th, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Brandon Wood replaces third baseman Nolan Arenado, batting 7th, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Tommy Field replaces shortstop Jonathan Herrera, batting 9th, playing shortstop.
Ryan Roberts homers (1) on a fly ball to left field.
Marc Krauss grounds out to first baseman Ben Paulsen.
Henry Blanco walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Chris Owings replaces Henry Blanco.
John McDonald grounds out, third baseman Brandon Wood to first baseman Ben Paulsen. Chris Owings to 2nd.
Gerardo Parra walks.
Cody Ransom singles on a ground ball to third baseman Brandon Wood. Chris Owings to 3rd. Gerardo Parra to 2nd.
Justin Upton grounds into a force out, fielded by third baseman Brandon Wood. Gerardo Parra out at 3rd.
Pitcher Change: Carlos Torres replaces Joe Gardner.
Paul Goldschmidt flies out to right fielder Kent Matthes.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter A. J. Pollock replaces Lyle Overbay.
A. J. Pollock grounds out, third baseman Brandon Wood to first baseman Ben Paulsen.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Ryan Wheeler replaces Ryan Roberts.
Ryan Wheeler called out on strikes.
Defensive Substitution: Wilin Rosario replaces catcher Wil Nieves, batting 5th, playing catcher.
Cole Gillespie pops out to first baseman Ben Paulsen.
Chris Owings homers (1) on a fly ball to center field.
Adam Eaton called out on strikes.
David Winfree called out on strikes.
Pitcher Change: Josh Sullivan replaces Carlos Torres.
Cody Ransom walks.
Rossmel Perez grounds into double play, second baseman Brendan Harris to shortstop Tommy Field to first baseman Ben Paulsen. Cody Ransom out at 2nd.
Paul Goldschmidt grounds out, second baseman Brendan Harris to first baseman Ben Paulsen.
Eric Young singles on a line drive to center fielder Gerardo Parra.
Marco Scutaro strikes out swinging. Eric Young steals (1) 2nd base. Eric Young advances to 3rd, on throwing error by catcher Henry Blanco.
Carlos Gonzalez grounds out, second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Lyle Overbay. Eric Young scores.
Jason Giambi grounds out, second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Jordan Pacheco singles on a ground ball to center fielder Gerardo Parra.
Charlie Blackmon grounds out to first baseman Lyle Overbay. Jordan Pacheco to 2nd.
Nolan Arenado doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Marc Krauss. Jordan Pacheco scores.
Chad Tracy grounds out, second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Lyle Overbay. Nolan Arenado to 3rd.
Jonathan Herrera doubles (1) on a fly ball to right fielder Justin Upton. Nolan Arenado scores.
Eric Young grounds out, shortstop John McDonald to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Pitcher Change: Charles Brewer replaces Daniel Hudson.
Marco Scutaro reaches on fielding error by third baseman Ryan Roberts.
Carlos Gonzalez grounds into double play, shortstop John McDonald to second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Lyle Overbay. Marco Scutaro out at 2nd.
Jason Giambi walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Chris Nelson replaces Jason Giambi.
Jordan Pacheco flies out to center fielder Gerardo Parra.
Charlie Blackmon singles on a ground ball to center fielder Gerardo Parra.
With Nolan Arenado batting, wild pitch by Charles Brewer, Charlie Blackmon to 2nd.
With Nolan Arenado batting, Charlie Blackmon steals (1) 3rd base.
Nolan Arenado walks.
Chad Tracy out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Gerardo Parra. Charlie Blackmon scores.
Jonathan Herrera strikes out swinging.
With Eric Young batting, wild pitch by Charles Brewer, Nolan Arenado to 2nd.
Eric Young grounds out, pitcher Charles Brewer to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Pitcher Change: Joe Paterson replaces Charles Brewer.
Defensive Substitution: Cody Ransom replaces second baseman Aaron Hill, batting 2nd, playing second base.
Marco Scutaro grounds out, second baseman Cody Ransom to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Andrew Brown strikes out swinging.
Chris Nelson strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Adam Eaton replaces shortstop John McDonald, batting 9th, playing right field.
Chris Owings remains in the game as the shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Craig Tatum replaces right fielder Justin Upton, batting 3rd, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Brett Lorin replaces Joe Paterson.
Wil Nieves grounds out, shortstop Chris Owings to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Brendan Harris flies out to right fielder Adam Eaton.
Brandon Wood flies out to center fielder Gerardo Parra.
Defensive Substitution: David Winfree replaces center fielder Gerardo Parra, batting 1st, playing first base.
A. J. Pollock remains in the game as the center fielder.
Ryan Wheeler remains in the game as the third baseman.
Defensive Substitution: Cole Gillespie replaces left fielder Marc Krauss, batting 7th, playing left field.
Pitcher Change: Kevin Munson replaces Brett Lorin.
Ben Paulsen called out on strikes.
Tommy Field grounds out, pitcher Kevin Munson to first baseman David Winfree.
Kent Matthes reaches on fielding error by third baseman Ryan Wheeler.
With Tyler Colvin batting, Kent Matthes caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Craig Tatum to shortstop Chris Owings.
Defensive Substitution: Rossmel Perez replaces catcher Craig Tatum, batting 3rd, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Jason Lane replaces Kevin Munson.
Tyler Colvin flies out to left fielder Cole Gillespie.
Andrew Brown flies out to right fielder Adam Eaton.
Chris Nelson singles on a fly ball to right fielder Adam Eaton.
Wilin Rosario singles on a ground ball to pitcher Jason Lane. Chris Nelson to 2nd.
Brendan Harris singles on a ground ball to shortstop Chris Owings. Chris Nelson scores. Wilin Rosario to 3rd. Throwing error by shortstop Chris Owings.
Brandon Wood strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Jonathan Albaladejo replaces Jason Lane.
Ben Paulsen homers (1) on a fly ball to right field.
